0x83CB5052.name: SET_PED_TO_RAGDOLL

params.name: minTime
params.description: Time(ms) Ped is in ragdoll mode; only applies to ragdoll types 0 and not 1.

0x83CB5052.description:
p4/p5: Unusued in TU27

### Ragdoll Types

**0**: CTaskNMRelax
**1**: CTaskNMScriptControl: Hardcoded not to work in networked environments.
**Else**: CTaskNMBalance

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [SET_PED_TO_RAGDOLL](?\_0xAE99FB955581844A).**
